name: Expedition
description:
You are an Expeditionist. One of a select few on a mission to discover new resources and technologies to aid in humanity’s quest of colonizing the galaxy. While exploring, you will struggle to survive the unique and unexpected challenges faced on your assigned planet. Complete the mission and get the data back to Earth, or remain stranded on the remote planet. Good luck!

Gather resources, build structures, and craft items to fight for your survival. You will become more familiar with the dangers of your environment as you explore the landscape. But you will also encounter greater dangers as you wander away from the landing zone.

Follow the mission log to complete your objectives. Humanity is counting on the Expeditionist for our species survival and expansion. Failure is not an option.
